name: Mage Alteration
description:
A game made from Python and PyGame.

This game was made for the PyGame Community New Years Jam.

This game is about trying to survive as long as possible while trying to avoid the red orbs falling from the sky and the enemies that try to eliminate you. You also have mutations in the form of powerups that you can obtain by grabbing the potions that fall from the sky which can help you survive longer.

As time progress, the game will become harder and harder with more red orbs and enemies spawning at a much faster rate.

Controls:

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Any Mouse Button - Shoot/Cast a spell
